pullrequest.title: Expose API to support adding items to model editor palette

content.raw:
I'm just wondering how exactly `AddItem` will be used, do you have a branch where that's being used? Buttons added would somehow need access to `ModelCreator` in order to add links, joints and stuff, right?

Also for example the internal functions connected to buttons on the palette do more than affect the `ModelCreator`, the simple shapes for example clear all selections and trigger the arrow mode. I guess I'm just worried about allowing users to add just any widget they want to the palette...
content.html:
I'm just wondering how exactly AddItem will be used, do you have a branch where that's being used? Buttons added would somehow need access to ModelCreator in order to add links, joints and stuff, right?

Also for example the internal functions connected to buttons on the palette do more than affect the ModelCreator, the simple shapes for example clear all selections and trigger the arrow mode. I guess I'm just worried about allowing users to add just any widget they want to the palette...
